question: I have {n1} liters of {fruit1} drink that is a fraction of {frac1} water and I wish to add it to {n2} liters of {fruit2} drink that is a fraction {frac2} water. But as I pour it, I spill {spill} liters of the {fruit1} drink. To make up for that, I add {spill} liters of water to the mix. What percentage of the final mix is water?
